Ourensan Democracy (, DO) is a political party active in the Province of Ourense, mainly in the Comarca of Ourense. DO was created in June 2001 by Gonzalo Pérez Jácome, who has been the party's main leader since its foundation. The party has its own TV channel, Auria TV.
